values: done with this livejournal. look for me on myspace!

oOpS! kind of forgot about this live journal. quiero mi xanga mucho mejor. (for all of you who dont know spanish, i just said i like my xanga much better)

-tonight was fun. except i could sleepover cause i have a soccer tourney tomarrow.

-XMAS iS COMiNG!!! i cant wait!
-MY PUPPY PACO iS THE BEST EVER!!! haha!
-we now have a [P-O-P] in science
-LiFe iS gOoD! i like not dealing with the drama to your momma stuff. i mean, stuff happens, but i am not usually involved.

-today at lunch, me, mckenna, mike, and troy played volleyball with a paper wad. troy got a conduct referral for putting this rat thing on my desk. being me, i screamed and cried. i didnt get in trouble for "having an outburst and disruppting the class". then troy also supposivley gave rudy a concussion. BS!

-had some good times last weekend! went to maria's and then went to a movie. and then shopping later. fUn!

-my soccer tourney is this weekend. i hope we do well!!! i am SCK - superstar courtney keeper. but im not playing keeper tomarrow, im playing mid. cause our best goalie is playing goalie. but she wont be there sunday so i gotsa play!


mimi food! LMAO!!!!!!!!! kenna and morgan!

Lets see...tomarrow is THANKSGiViNG!!! gonna eat lotta food!

-in english we had to come up with how many words we could make from thanksgiving. i got like 62. i think she said there were 79 or something possible
-report cards and ITBS testing scores today. i did well i think. better than i expected!
-schools fun but the past two days have been SO LONG!
-monday i am going to the ROGERS/CASTRO game. anyone wanna join?
-wanted to go to movies with sophie today...didnt go. =(
-ice skating this weekend!
-did i ever mention that my soccer team GOT FiRST PLACE!!! GO FORCE!!!
-LiFe iS gOoD!

so xmas is coming up soon, and idk what to get everyone?!?! something good. like, im gonna give everyone the same thing plus something special. i need to go to the mall...


MOOKiE!

-courtney ...my new nickname is Cocopuff! i think ive been called it before, thx maria!

i started eating this orange at 8! its like, 9:20 now!!!

okay, short and sweet update--
on the drive home from my soccer tourney, i was really tierd and i listened to music. anyway you want it (you know, that song by journey, cept it was rise against) started playing. then i realized how music gets you into these moods. i started thinking about ally and how happy she has made me. i cant ever leave her. these past two weeks ive been thinking our friendship is done, but i cant ever do that.


YAY!!! THANKSGiViNG iS COMiNG UP!!! XMAS TOO!!! cant wait to eat! LoL!
oh yeah!!! and everyone is gonna come over!!! SO EXCiTED!


...i LOVE MY OHANA!!! AND FRiENDS!!! your all the best!

-im such a procrastinator (sp?)

home alone right now...its borning. just working on hw

yesterday was so much fun!!! first, i went up to redwood city and then pacifica for soccer. then, uh, came home around 6:30. i had to take a really fast shower cause i had to be a sophias at 7. i ended up going to kennas later so sophia could pick us up.
it was me, kenna, sophie, morgan, amanda, and sophies neighbor ali. so WE ALL WENT iCE-SKATiNG!!! SO MUCH FUN! there were a couple drama bitches and stuff. what losers. and the redhead guy was weird. blah. uh...then we all slept over at sophies. haha! such good times!

then i came home and now i am here! yeah-ah


OMGSH! kenna, you really need to get those rain boots!

things have been getting better. i just feel so frustated. the person who i thought was my BEST friend, is just a crappy person. idk what happened cause we used to be the bestest friends ever! things were so perfect until we had this fight over something stupid (like always) and she became closer to this other girl. so, that sucked. things havent changed. lots of other peoples have told me shes a bitch now, and that i have changed in a good way.

im also confused...bOyS! haha!
but, i guess i am really happy =) now cause i have the best friends in the world!!!


TODAY was like, the best day in the world!!! so many good times. i told troy a lot of stuff and idk why?!?! haha
yesterday was our teams vball party at chevys. hella fun! oh! and also i shadowed at PRES which was hella fun! i saw LOREAL!!! haha!
i think im gonna go ice skating with kenna and sophie! woot-woot! i havent been ice skating in forever! lol! i wanna go to the movies this weekend...idk!


-court

its after school...

i was gonna go to sophie's tonight with kenna to go to the dance. but, they are going to the movies instead. i cant go though. =( tomarrow is ladder49 with kenna and maria, hopefully!

*** NEW OBSESSiON: THE GET UP KiDS!!! ***

other news...the election, no comment!
i have all 3 of the cancer bracelets! yay!


on monday night i spent the night at kennas with sophie. we just saw the grudge and we were a little shaken up. we didnt talk to much about my problems because, i guess i was keeping them bottled up. but its okay, i didnt really wanna share it then. but, i am so FiCKLE!!! i cant make up my mind! i usually trust my friends to make the decsions for me, and they all say the same thing do this or just trust you heart. idk what my heart says. i feel one way, but i know some of my friends wouldnt approve of that. idk...

hey its halloween!!! not at home right now... when i got home from trick-or-treating, drove up to cousins house.

PLEASE HELP!!! i am just so confused with this livejournal stuff. idk even why i made one! haha! i guess i was bored. but like, what do you do??? huh? HELP!


ive been in a weird mood lately. idk why though. im perfectly happy, friends, ohana, school, all is going great. but my knee is so discusting! (*licks hand* lol, maria and sam!) i was being the stupid person i am, and slid on the gym floor without my knee pads on. so, it hurts. ouch! friday went to marias with sam. we had some fun! it was also the halloween carnival at our school that the 8th grade puts on. it was boring but hella funny! i wanted to go to great america with sam and some other peoples, but i couldnt. ho hum. my foot is asleep now.

idk what else to talk about. its gonna be november in a couple of minutes. haha! oh! we had a mock election in class. kerry won. :D it was close though...

hasta luego! -look at the spainish i kno! haha!



//_Courtney_\\

so, its my first update. dunno what to say. not feeling too well the past two days! eEk! uh, vision vball tryouts tomarrow. i hope i feel better, A LOT better for those. gawd! i am so nervous!










ADD ME, PLEASE!
